charges.charge_description: 18 USC 371: COUNT 1: knowingly and unlawfully conspire with others to make a false statement to purchase a firearm(s) in violation of Title 18, USC, 924(a)(1)(A); COUNT 2: knowingly and unlawfully conspire with others to make a false statement to purchase a firearm(s) in violation of Title 18, USC, 924(a)(1)(A); COUNT 3: knowingly and unlawfully conspire with others to make a false statement to purchase a firearm(s) in violation of Title 18, USC, 924(a)(1)(A).
